primevc.utils.TypeUtil

class

Static Methods

inline as<T>(o : Dynamic, t : Class<T>) : T

Optimized simple instanceof check. Compiles to bytecode or Useful to quickly cast an object.

inline is(o : Dynamic, t : Class<Dynamic>) : Bool

Optimized simple instanceof check. Compiles to bytecode or Useful to quickly check if an object implements some interface. Warning: Use Std.is() for checking enums and stuff.
